Self-Awareness.small_text: You understand your emotions and inner drives.
Self-Awareness.big_text: You know what makes you tick—and how to manage your thoughts and actions.

Self-Regulation.small_text: You can manage your emotions and stay in control.
Self-Regulation.big_text: You remain calm, patient, and thoughtful under pressure or stress.

Motivation.small_text: You are driven, focused, and full of initiative.
Motivation.big_text: You don’t wait for external rewards. You push yourself forward with purpose.

Empathy.small_text: You easily sense how others feel and respond with care.
Empathy.big_text: You listen with your heart, connect deeply, and care about others’ needs.

Social Skills.small_text: You build connections easily and communicate well.
Social Skills.big_text: You know how to collaborate, lead conversations, and inspire people.

Leadership.small_text: You naturally step up to lead and guide others.
Leadership.big_text: You’re influential, inspiring, and focused on uniting people toward a common goal.
